meanings.definition: To steer better than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She outsteers her brother in video games.
meanings.sent2: The experienced captain outsteers the novice sailor.
meanings.sent3: The little duckling outsteers its siblings to reach the food first.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outsteers any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The skilled driver outsteers the competition with ease.

meanings.sent1: He outsteers his friends in go-kart racing.
meanings.sent2: The professional cyclist outsteers the amateurs in the race.
meanings.sent3: The clever squirrel outsteers the others to get to the nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition outsteers any GPS device.
meanings.sent5: The talented pilot outsteers the storm to land safely.
